values:
new journal Konstantine3072



check it out bitches

so im cool and am updating again b/c i have no life at all.

band practice went so well today. im happy with it and im happy with our songs. we jsut need mics, badly and amps. i may be able to use the 2 i have . ..but thts up in air.

n/e wayas . . .im tired and have a huge test that i didnt study for, forgot my stuff. oops oh well. guess i'll just fail.

im looking at a DVD .. SoCo live at Ventura Place.

I WANT IT I WANT IT I WANT IT!!!!

i watched it in Chicago and LOVED it . .. i literally jumped out of bed to watch it. i was mesmereized for like an hour . . .best hour of my life

 

 

and im still void of everything

its Halloween tomorrow and i have NO clue what im doing. Brooke invited me to go trick-or-treating with her and her friends . .so maybe.

i just pealed a ton of potatoes with rachel . .i feel like a slave. my hands smell starchy, gross.

im going to Kurts in a few hours to have band rehearsal. we have our show on the 26 . . im not sure if were gonna have enough stuff. i really really REALLY hope we do. im scared as hell that we wont or that people are gonna hate what we've written. especially what i've written. if they hate it i'll be so sad b/c those are my emotions in there and my thought process . .ugh, i'll just cry and they'll feel bad.

i got new icons last night. they're so pretty!

i read my email from Tyler, they alwasy seem to cheer me up. its nice to know that someone is taking a moment out of their day to write me something. its comforting i think

i feel really empty today. just devoid of every emotion. i have a ton of work to do but i just cant seem to bring myself to do any of it. i need to re-write my reasearch proposal to Mrs. Smith . .damn damn damn.

 

and i have to get dressed now b/c im getting picked up in 20. im starting to despise getting dressed. maybe i'll become a nudist and live out my days in a colony of other naked people . . ..but probably not

its so cold tonight








i need to find a lover



im losing hope. everyone i love loves someone else, and im the one who gets left behind in the end

Take the quiz: <a href="http://www.zenhex.com/quiz.php?id=8445">"What kind of eyes do you have? (with pictures)"<br><img src="http://img1.zenhex.com/quiz2/8445/res1.jpg" border="0"></a><br><b>Brown</b><br>You have brown eyes.  Brown is the color of the earth.  Your eyes symbolize your comforting and fostering nature.  You are stable, grounding, sophisticated, considerate, conventional and orderly.  People may consider you to be cozy or warm.  People feel safe when they are with you.  Some words to describe you:  reliability, elegance, security, healing, homely, grounding, foundation, and earthly.

this was kinda cool

im eating pistachio nuts and animal crackers. its wonderful .

im thinking about changing my livejournal name. something more me i think . .i dont know. i'll get back to you. maybe

i am lazy and sleepy and company is coming over so i had to clean my room. i forgot that i had a floor. . .i dont really like it

mal and i are going downtown to do something. i think pick up beads. woohoo

 


"Nobody Puts Baby In The Corner"

Drink down that Gin and Kerosene,
And come spit on bridges with me,
Just to keep us warm.
Light a match to leave me be.
Light a match to leave me be.

I keep my jealousy close,
'Cause it's all mine.
And if you say this makes you happy,
Then I'm not the only one lying.

[Chorus: x2]
Keep quiet,
Nothing comes as easy as you.
Can I lay in your bed all day?
I'll be your best kept secret
And your biggest mistake.
The hand behind this pen relives a failure every day.

And I keep my jealousy close,
'Cause it's all mine.
And if you say this makes you happy,
Then I'm not the only one lying.

And come spit on bridges with me,
Just to keep us warm.

Nothing comes as easy as you.

[comes back in during chorus 2nd time:]
(So wear me like a locket around your throat.
I'll weigh you down.
I'll watch you choke.
You look so good in blue.
You look so good in blue.)

I dont know why I even try anymore because everytime i feel like its better things just blows up in my face and i have to pretend all over again.

 

 

 

i dont know if i can do this anymore . . . . i really really dont know right now

 

 

 

 

 

plz dont make this trite and try to make this about you. b/c chances are its not

 

i think the person who said "you only hurt the ones you love" was never really loved

close my eyes
thought i was lost but i was stranded
i go outside
to my surprise the sky had landed
i thought it made more sense
if i could only keep you guessing
i was a fool to think
that i should stop you from undressing
now i'm believing all the words you say
that i can't say back to you
to you

so i fall
i don't wanna feel this small
you know i just can't handle this
handle this at all
and i'll just fall
i let my heartbeat drop
i falter as the music stops
and you watch me as stall
and wonder when i fall

i kiss your neck
i feel you breathing on my shoulder
still i'm perfect
it must be you cause now it's over
i was so close
that was the most that i have ever been through
now old cassettes and cigarettes
will be the ones to save you
how can you ask for me to stay
when all you ever do is go?
just go

and so i fall
i don't wanna feel this small
you know i just can't handle this
handle this at all
and so i fall
i let my heartbeat drop
i falter as the music stops
and you watch me as i stall
and wonder when i..

go on
you've kept me waiting
go on
and watch me as i fall
i don't wanna feel this small
you know i just can't handle this
handle this at all
and so i fall
i let my heartbeat drop
i falter as the music stops
and you watch me as i stall
and wonder when i..

i am sooooo tired, its unvelievable how exhausted i feel right now. Anna and i went to the City Building today to get permit/deed restriction stuff and well ended up w/ nada and a ton more questions. well i have questions at least. this article is completely running my life and im starting to get drained. but i love it so much that i cant stop. this may be the end of me, but it'll be so kick ass tht it wont matter

we got our deed today, so we dont have to go to court. thnk god. we were getting all ready to call MIPA and prepare a little, and then the fax came. plus we talked to some journalist from the Enquirer today and just things that he said made me feel so much better about the whole thing. i know tht its all gonna come together.

 

i just hope that this will make some sort of difference, ya know?

oh man, the concert last night was AMAZING. i got to talk to Deja Normal and I have BIG BIG BIG news that i want to tell you all, but i want to tell someone else first. its tht important, buts its amazing to say the least

ally and i had a rave last night downtown with scarecrows and running and other weird stuff like tht.

i have pops concert (again) today and i hate it. in fact i gotta go get ready b/c i have to be there at 12:15 to set up chairs for like 2 freakin hours. dont come , pops concert is embarrasing. come to out chamber choir festival on thursday, its soooooo much better.

yep, im boring

sorry about the rediculously loooong post yersterday , let me sum up. ANDREW, THE LOVE OF MY LIFE, IS IN RECOVERY FROM LUEKEMIA!! and i think i could just die from happiness and relief, i've been smiling and all excited about everything today. it was amazing not thinking about him and how much pain he must have been in. and yeah, i sound idiotic, but i could care less b/c he's amazing.

anna banana and i have the BEST article in the world. its so intense and difficult and amazing. i feel like a real reporter and like im actually being productive. and i got a 42 out of 40 on my reduction. ha ha, i rock.


its been a good good good day. oh and Dr. Byrens doesnt think im dying, yay. no more meds and doctor visits at 8 fucking AM. i was sick of tht and being poked at. no fun. i hate the hospital with a passion.



hmm, sooooooo i heard that Black Eyes Pea's song (my hump?). its so weird, i havent listened to that kinda music in a looooooooooooooooong time,let me tell ya. oh and i heard Gold Digga .. .kayne west can do die for all i care. he bugs me. i think he hates white ppl, and guess what, i base tht on nothing! sound familiar (Bush hates black ppl). no, he hates ignorant assholes like you kayne who spend all their cash on LV vests instead of donating it to the homeless. maybe you hate poor ppl. maybe. i dont like Bush either, but at least he isnt all like "black ppl hate me . .boo hoo"


idiots like tht need to be put on their own special little island where they can have dumb debates over worthless stuff and fight over nothing. it'll be fun, like a TV show. and we can all watch and laugh at the stupidity of it all. it'll be called "Idiot Isle" and we'll all love it

i got NEW icons, yay!! im pumped, all andrew stuff which rocks my face off completely and a half. im talkign to Anna and getting her all excited and eager about them. its hilarious. she wants to cry b/c they are so pretty, me2.

i just finished Scarlet Letter and it was HORRIBLE! they kill my favorite character and i cried and it was jsut awful for me. completely awful and i wanna KILL hawthorne sooooo much, but hes dead so i cant do much except laugh b/c im alive. bastard. im pissed. Dimmesdal was such and awesom guy and so sweet and loving and then he jsut dies. WTF? who does that, who fucking kills an awesome guy? murr. i should rewerite the last few pages, maybe last chapter, it'd go something like this:


Chillingworth was killed by Dimmesdale and the crazy witch lady b/c no one liked him and he was a jerk. you dont try to kill a priest who is sweet as hell, abandon your wife, and be all sneaky eager boy, no one likes that. ITS NOT COOL. so he dies and everyone is so happy, and at the big town party Dimmesdale tells ppl that he is a sinner with Hester and eveyone is shocked (gasp!!) but its ok b/c they just leave. they steal a pirate ship (ok,there were so pirates at the end, it was so out of place and weird) and sail away and live somewhere random, like Greece or Milan. i dont know yet. but they're happy and Hester doesnt have to wear the letter anymore and Dimmesdale isnt being all self inflictive and innner turmoil-y and Pearl isnt throwing rocks at seagulls anymore (who the hell does that??)and acting mean to Hester. She chills out basically, fuck yeah. and we all live fucking happily ever after and its so sweet that it makes you ill. THE END


take that Hawthorne, you bitter little pill

mal is sitting behind me on the laptop printing out a picture for Anna and reading stories out loud. its making me smile b/c its so intense.
i kinda want to make a cd right now, but im too lazy and junk. last night i was thinking about what my 'saddest song' is and im really embarrassed to admit what it is. but i guess its not really the song, its the memory that I have when i hear it. bad times, so now i cant listen to it anymore b/c i jsut freak out and cry remembering that bad memmory. murr, oh well. the song wasnt that good to begin with

one of these days im gonna make a 'sad mix' with all the songs that make me sad and never ever ever listen to it. its just for remebering





"the middle' by Jimmy Eat World. thats the worst sad song EVA and its mine

chicago was amazing.
and the blue man group was hilarious.
and i decied that im applying to a college near or in Old Town/Lincoln Park. that place was just so me, it was scary. if you've been there, you'll get it.

im exhausted, it was such a busy weekend. and i had to re-notate all of Scarlet Letter. which wasnt bad, just sooooo time consuming and it was time i didnt have.

i have a ton to do, like homework and junk. jsut wanted to let you all know that im home








i tried on a skinny pair of size 2 jeans when i was in chicago, and they fit. :)

i was looking at back entries and remembering how i was when i wrote all tht stuff out. its so bad, its so hard remembering how i was and how, just, hurt i was. i dont want to be that person again. i know im not great, or well, or w/e, but im not as shitty as i was then. im so much better, im such a better person. i dont want to lose that. i dont want to go back to how i was, but once in a while i feel myself slipping so hard back into that girl and its so scary that i could just lose everything and all tht time that i spent trying to get back to a normal esque state of mind. and i dont expect any of you to do anything b/c you cant. you cant make me believe anything about myself. and its just, so, i dont even know. . . 
                                              weird
                                               and
                                            messed up
                     and i know deep down that im never gonna be like everybody else 
                                and feel good about 'stuff' or right
                 


and im so afraid that everyone is gonna know and pity me and try to say stuff to cheer me up but will actually just make me feel

      
                                             horrible

oh my stomach hurts like fuuuuuck


we had the PSAT today . . .i dont know what to say about it, other than i didnt like getting up early to be at school earlier. pointless. completely pointless


and im grounded from my phone until next tuesday. so tht means i have to talk to my family. what do you say to them? "hmm . . nice weather were having. will you plz make sure my laundry gets done?" i can only do tht for so long w.o losing my mind.

i found out im missing 5 or so Something Corporate songs, and it made me so sad. now i have to have mal download them for me. i feel bad b/c thts time tht she has to spend lookiong for one stupid song. eh, i guess she can call it my birthday gift and we'll be even.

she was all worked up tonight b/c we;re leaving her in the hotel room while we go into the city. it was hilarious. not like she wasnt pissed tho, just annoyed. still funny as hell. poor forgotten child . except not really

so, i got my stories and pictures all finished for newspaper. im soooo excited for all of you to read my article and my reviews. im a loser, but i guess that makes me happy knowing tht im getting published (even if its only high school stuff).

as you know, im going to Chicago this weekend, so i'll be missing the big game (im so depressed, let me tell ya). i'll call one of you, prolly caitlin, and ask how the whole thing went. im staying on the outskirts of the city tho . . . we couldnt get a room b/c of some conference tht weekend. lame lame lame. but its still chicago. we're seeing The Blueman Group and eating at Tavern on Rush if that means anything to you guys. and of course, some shopping. so if any of you know of any awesome stores, that i would like, in that area, just post them so i can check them out.

oh god, the Rufus concert was AMAZING! it was just him and a piano and a guitare and then we got to meet him after the whole thing. he was so skinny and tall, but adorable. i think Emily basically died last night, sooo intense. then we had mad adventures in the student union. em has pictures and im writing a review on the concert and HE GAVE ME A QUOTE!!! I <3 Rufus


so, i went to Dr. Byrens and I have to stay on meds for another 2 weeks and i have these rediculous ear drops tht are gonna kill. and he THINKS tht it's either an infection of smoe sort or a cyst, either way i have no idea what it going on. but thnx for caring guys, i really appriciate it. you really have no idea what it means to me.


oh, goign to Chicago next weekend, so cait if you could bring me your dress i will love you forever!

im going to pick up pumpkins today, erik, if you break them i will maim you w/i an inch of your life

so, i've been living off of rice, water, and painkillers. mostly painkillers. Dr.Byrens gave me some of the narcotic kind, works fabulously. except im having trouble typing and stuff like tht. :) good good goo mood tho.

i  miss you guys like fuck tho, i've been so bored and lonely. Im not getting my ear lanced (yet). so im really relived, and im goign back to the hospital on the 7th to figure out what is goign on. lets hope its not serious, right?

um, im not planning on goign to homecoming anymore. if you know me well enouigh, you'll probably figure out why, if not then no big. 

someone give me a call

anna's putting weird stuff on my skin and i just snorted fun dip. guess what doesnt taste good? Garnier fructis hair stuff for curls. yep, not good taste

im watcing Anchor Man. pleasure land. mmm ( i just burned my tongue.)

i feel like i have lyrics to post, but i cant remember them.

so, Im "up north" right now, as is the whole civilization of Marshall. Its interesting . . .to say the least. nothing has been going on lately, i guess. Oh, im looking for a Homecoming date, thats whats going on. yep, fasinating stuff. im in such a horrible mood right now, i have no idea why. but on the bright side i can get as hammered as I want this weekend and no one has to know or care. :) 2 escapes in one, fabulous.

oh, can some one give me the info for the Dresden Dolls concert in Oct?

im watching Beauty and the Beast . .i thought that the girls would enjoy it, but i guess not. i like it, the girl likes to read, like me . .oh im so fucking lame. eh, what can ya do?

so . .im working, again, u guys should call me after i get off ( 5). b/c well, im getting bored doing nothing but work. 
i got my classes today . .im pissed. im not taking French b/c choir interferred w/ it. so no language for sidne. im gonna see if Madame will take me after school to teach me french, and maybe caitlin could help me too. so i dont fall behind (hint hint)

dad still hasnt called me back. im a little sad about it, but its not like i can make him talk to me, right?
he gets it. he completely, totally, 100 percent gets it.

im working,but i got a free moment. 
caitlin, i dont know what i'd do without you. thank you so much. you just let me talk your ear off for like 2 hours about just everything.and i feel like i havent been there much for you . .but when i was at your house last night that didnt matter at all. it was like old times and i jsut love that about you. how you just get your friends and accept them for what they are; flaws and all. i wont do anything stupid and this year is gonna be so good. me, you, and kara. it'll rock. i hope you had fun with ehr today getting coffee, i was so unhappy that i couldnt be there, but im just glad that shes home and now we can all hang out again!! we should do a coffee friday before work tomorrow. ;) but back on track . . .you have no idea how much it meant to me that you would just hear me out about EVERYTHING. i think that you and very few other people completely get me. and thts all i need. i could care less about everybody else. if they cant get it, at least a little, they arent worth my time or energy.

emily i miss you like fuck. and we need to talk because i miss miss miss talking to you soooo much! i think im gonna call you in a few minutes.


im trying not to let certain things bother me right now. im trying to get on with my life. im sick of feeling hurt and wretched. im thinking of asking my mom for therapy, but im afraid she'll laugh in my face and tell me im not depressed. im not depressed, im just . . .wrong. i feel wrong sometimes. i get sad about things alot then cnat shake it for like a week. plus i have all my personal garbage that we all seem to have nad be able to carry. im just a little weaker than most i think. nothing huge, just need to build up some muscle, if you catch my drift

i was talking to Brad last night and somehow we got on the subject of clothing (dont ask) and how he felt he had to dress a certain way because his dad was a doctor and it was 'expected of him'. then i told him that i was a morticians daughter and i just wear what i like. im not goth. i think that it would be so sad if your parents occupation control how you let society view you. so sad. but interesting none the less.

i got in 2 hours of sleep last night. not even that. 1 and a half. too much caffine . .so i read and read and journal wrote and just sat in bed composing a letter that i'll never ever write and thinking about things that will never ever happen . .but it was nice to pretend for a bit. yeah, im weird . . sue me.

im supposed to be working right about now. the girl im watching is building a fort, its too cute. too bad its small and built for a four year old. i'll make my own, ha.

everything is coming apart at the seams
i could try to fight it
but it haunts me in my dreams
im losing
im not surprised because its me
this isnt about you
dont think for a second it maybe


i dont even know, it seemed to fit. 

i saw emily, ally, krissy, and miriam today. it was nice. got a message from pizzmint, always good. i think tht im gonna call caitlin later .. or finish my movie.

finally rented PUMPKIN . . it was amazing. but i love Christina Ricci, so im biased. far as im concerned all her films are fab. so yeah . .see tht one and PROZAV NATION b/c i love them and hope u will too. 

god, the way the mother and father act (in Prozac Nation) is just like my parents. in fact tht whole movie hit so close to home, except tht im not on prozac,im not wanting to end my life, and im not having sex.basically, im not her . . we just have a similiar life and approach to therapy. it was the home life tht was so similiar to my own too. it scared me a little. watching from a different set of eyes. wonder if mal felt the same. i could never ask her. we barely even talk about it, it just hurts too much. dunno, maybe if u guys saw it, you would think about why people do what they do. its all for a reason. existentialism. tht and its just an amazing piece. i dont know. maybe im just filling up space here. theres so much i want to say about the movie, but i dont know how. i dont have the words to describe it well

 http://hank.envy.nu/general.htm  (this is hank harris . .i heart him)

hung out w/ greg, carmen, em, and ally yesterday. tres amusante. i missed them. u never really realize how much you love someone when u havent seen them in a while. that goes for a lot of my friends.

caitlin and family came home today!! I missed her soooo much. got a chance to chat w. her. good good. plus, mom is leaving tonight for Sturgis. i'll miss her, but we need a break. we keep burning each other up. we had a huge college discussion . . .it went ok. Im going to live with my dad and study in Chicago for 2 years, then im transfering to Berkley (sp?) or some college near or in SanFran. i'll go mad if i stay here.

i've been ok, not fabulous, but just ok. i dont feel like im just living n/e more, which is a good thing. im trying to keep busy and find things to do, i dont wanna fall back into what i was. i hated that person. but i think that we all secretly hate ourselves, we just have to make an effort to love and accept.

i went to warp tour yesterday. i dont even know what to say, i'll show u my pics when they get developed. it was definetly the most amazing thing EVER. i actually crowd surfed and got into the mosh pits, yeah, wtf right?

i got Emery, Mae, Hawthorne Heights, Amber Pacific, and MxPx to sign my jeans. and found random boys to lift me up so i could watch the damn show. 



im so tired.  .. . oh, i got condoms too and signed up for PETA (HA!!)

so for some weird reason, you cant write commemts anymore, it makes me a little sad . .but i love this layout so w.e.

my new computer came a few days ago, thts exciting. and GREASE is over. its so hard. i hate the week after, i just wanna do something and i feel so lost. i have nothing so i keep making these plans w/ ppl and try to keep busy. im gonna get burned out eventually.

im leaving on sunday for DETRIOT for warp tour . . fcuk yeah (i cant type profanities for sum reason) awww, too bad

i've had such an AMAZING summer, its been so awesome. Grease, meeting new ppl, dealing w/ all the bull i've been carrying around w/ me. i feel so relaxed. just sitting here typing all this nothingness. 

i've done everything this summer, everything i've been wanting to do and try, i;ve done. i feel more complete, more confused, more alive than i've been in a while. good show.


oh kurt, sry i couldnt make it to practice.i really was grounded, i feel awful not being able to come. i wrote sum lyrics tho. we should get together and write a melody for it, well them, b.c i have a lot.

eric, my love, call me. oh and send me tht pic of us (u know which one ;) )

i learned a new word today :Chav. i likie, a lot. 


new layout is bitching, in my mind.

firstly, HAPPY FATHER's DAY! 

good day overall, woke up at a sorta decent time today and got to sleep at like 2 am last night. slowly getting better :). it was so nice, i woke up this morning and took a shower and my dad was sitting at our dining room table eating lunch and he just shared it w/ me i was like "awww, thnk u!"  this of course was after I had told him i was gonna kill his cat for eating part of my shirt. no kdding, fucking ate the strap off my shirt . luckily its hard to tel and im jsut gonna get it repaired, so yeah . . im still pissed at tht damn cat tho. i told him about ELEPHANT today, and he seemed kinda interested so I was really excited b/c my mom had no interesnt and i kinda wanted to talk about the movie w. an adult, so this is good news. mom jsut doesnt get it . .its like she wants nothing to do w/ me, like im this total failure of a daughter b/c im not a bouncy,little prep cheerleader type. but its ok, b/c if shes doesnt like the way I am, its her own fault and im not gonna change so she can love me.

oh, eric and I had an awesome convo last night about cheering ppl up and jsut telling them something (genuine) tht will make their day . .and im gonna do tht. 

to all of my friends, my closest ones and ones im jsut getting to know better, i think that your beautiful in everyway imaginable and i couldnt even think of a world where i didnt know u. :)

so, its 2 am and i cant sleep. again. so im up listening to w/e i can get my little hands on. currently, gatsby's american dream, dallas green, and eisly. oh and annah, u and i need to make CD's. just because we should have something super awesome to listen to after watching Star Wars :)



im gonna go on a hunt for sum sleeping pills . . .or niquil. w/e is closer

bonjour mes amies. i miss you terribly!! but i'll be home on the 21st. so . .just woke up. I've been sleeping a lot lately, more than a healthy person should. but its nice to wake up and see the midday sun shining in on my white blanket. i worry though, tht theres something wrong . .why im always so tired and sleep the day away. it cant be good, but it feels so good so i honestly dont give a fuck about my health.

so, during the big dance off Fench and Doody turn into quite scandalous people. i mean chest grabbing, dirrty dancing , the whole sha-bang . . . .im pumped. im so gonna tunr Marshall on its goddamn little WASP ear :) ha ha

ok, so i have finally come to end w/ government. well, actually i came to an end with it about a month or so ago. i dont care, i jsut dont care. its so corrupt and fucked up and i want nothing to do with it at all. we'd be better off starting fresh so people will cease to bitch about stuff that doesnt even eefect them. (stem cell research for example, i know some of my friends will say tht its for 'ethical reason', but it doest realy harm u in any way. what a women chooses to do w/ her fetus is her choice.) and dont call me a fucking liberal b/c i've had it up to here w/ the damn welfare program. if tht make me anti american or an 'anarchist' so be it. im just done

on a lighter note, i' read FIGHT CLUB and found it amazing. its one of my favorite booksthe author is so eloiqunet and  blunt.


i just woke up, literally

i wore tht shirt today . .tres comfortable. love boho inspired clothing.

im missing rehearsal right now and im so sad. ui wanna be there with you guys so much, dancing, and talking and acting and being mean to rude people . . sigh. im excited to get back to tht, but not to be back w/ mom quite so soon. she can be nice, but she doesnt understand me .. and she proly never will. but thts ok, i have friends who do and i know who I am, so fuck her.

so, andrew is NOT dying!!! his leukemia is TREATABLE and the easiest to treat. god, i cant even tell you how horrible it felt not knowing if he was gonna live or die . .yes, im fan-girly, sue me. that boy is pushing me to achieve something, even if i ahvent poken to him. if he can make a cd, self promote it, become known through out the world, hopefully battle leukemia, and be so unbelievably sweet then I can get my ass out of bed and accomplish my dreams too.

heard Jack's Mannequin today . . .Em, we gotta gotta GOTTA see them in concert. i think tickets r cheap, i'll see what i can do. BTW, im pumped to see this pic ;)

oh, loooong day. woke up, headed in chicago, saw blues fest, walked all over, went to Sanrio and forever 21, bought cute boho shirt, walked back to SUV, went to chinatown, contemplated over a piggy bank, then had dinner w/ the family at the BEST chinese resturaunt (no joke, it was voted best in all of chinatown). yay for curry hot pot. but god, this shirt i bought is soooooooooooo low cut, im like "holy cow!! look, you can see my boobs basically" i'll wear it the movie ;)
